name: illo - birth of the cool (Canceled)
blurb: illo \u2013 birth of the cool - a 3D action puzzle adventure on iOS & Android. Touch, feel and throw illo across a vast dreamscape!

rewards.reward: We will try with all of our efforts to teach your name to Ugiallo!

Exclusive wallpaper of the game (make your computer look cooler) + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer (it will be the first thing will we do if we are successful). In addition, each backer will have access to the illo backer forum where they can contribute to design and development ideas as well as view pre-production artwork. You never know, with a great idea you could get it into the game for just $5.

The reward where you get the finished game!  Your choice of illo birth of the cool on iOS or Android + 5 original (and wonderfully unique) digital postcards of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + access to the illo backer forum to share your ideas with us.

Your platform choice of the finished game + a digital version of the original soundtrack (which is cool all by itself!) + 5 original digital postcards of the game + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access.

The reward where you get all the main goodies - how cool is that?! Your platform choice of the finished game + original T-shirt (with a choice of 2 x designs - so you can be cool offline was well as online!) + a digital version of the original soundtrack + 5 original digital postcards of the game + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access.

Now we're getting serious. Your platform choice of the finished game + illo postcard with illo team members signatures dedicated just to you (wow, you'll feel like royalty!) + the limited edition digital artbook on the development of illo + original T-shirt + a digital version of the original soundtrack + 5 original digital postcards of the game + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access.

A little more serious now (yes, the excitement is building!). Your platform choice of the finished game + original soundtrack CD (hot printing) + illo postcard with team members signatures dedicated to you + limited edition digital artbook + 2 T-shirts (both versions) + 10 original digital postcards of the game (the complete collection) + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access.

OK, deep breath - your platform choice of the finished game + 1 illo handmade puppet (yes, illo made real!) + 1 printed concept artwork signed by Luca + original soundtrack CD signed by the musicians (a real jazz trio, if you please) + illo postcard with team members signatures dedicated to you + limited edition digital artbook + 2 T-shirts (both versions) + 10 original digital postcards of the game (complete collection) + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access. Try saying all that in one go!

This is for the exclusive stuff (this you won't get anywhere else) - your platform choice of the finished game + the limited edition printed artbook (hard cover) signed by Luca and the team + 1 illo handmade puppet + original soundtrack CD + 2 T-shirts (both versions) + illo postcard with team members signatures dedicated to you + 10 original digital postcards of the game (complete collection) + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access.

This exclusivity is growing a pace - your platform choice of the finished game + 1 original concept artwork painting signed by Luca + 1 printed artbook signed by Luca and the team + original soundtrack CD  +  2 T-shirts (both versions) + illo postcard with team members signatures dedicated to you + 10 original digital postcards of the game (complete collection) + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access.

We're now in 'Exclusive Club Class' where you can sit back and relax - your platform choice of the finished game + iPad 4 wi-fi 16GB (in white so you can play illo anywhere and at anytime and be sooo cool!) + 1 exclusive concept artwork painting signed by Luca + 1 printed artbook signed by Luca and the team + original soundtrack CD + 2 T-shirts (both versions) + illo postcard with team members signatures dedicated to you + 10 original digital postcards of the game (complete collection) + exclusive wallpaper of the game + your name listed on the illo website as a Kickstarter backer + illo backer forum access.

OK, this is the big one, are you ready for a games development holiday? We will invite you to spend 3 days with us at the Raylight offices in Napoli (or Naples depending where you're from) on the beautiful west coast of Italy. It's also just a stone's throw from the historical city of Pompeii and seaside town of Sorrento - (hey you could do some great sightseeing too!). 

We want you to bring your massive and fantastic ideas for the game which you can pitch to us and then we'll discuss and develop them together with Luca and the team. We'll show you the basics of video game development, give you pointers on game design and let you have exclusive access to illo! 

Lastly on the final night of your stay, we'll take you to enjoy the very best Pizza restaurant in the entire world (yes, it really does exist) together with the illo team. Is this a great reward or what?! Accommodation and flights for 1 person are included + access to early versions of the game + your platform choice of the finished game + original T-shirt + 1 original concept artwork painting dedicated to you from Luca.
